casebody.data:
In the Matter of J.T.W. No. 477A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Holly M. Groce, for Guardian ad Litem. Thomas Young, Rocky Mount, for Iredell County DSS.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of November 2006 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Mother) shall have up to and including the 15th day of December 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
